creator: 4books ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Learn the key concepts of the best business books, to read or listen to, anywhere in just 15 minutes.
Every week a new content, so you can stay up to date on marketing, management, personal growth, leadership, investments, entrepreneurship and much more.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As of today, over 250,000 people have decided to be part of our big project: to gather the best business ideas and make them available to everyone, easy to understand, quick to put into practice.

LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF THE BEST BUSINESS BOOKS

- Discover the contents of the best books in the world in 11 different categories: marketing and communication, motivation, well-being and personal growth, management and leadership, startups and entrepreneurship, business and strategy, money and investments, economics, science and technology, psychology and sales.
- Update your skills and your training: every week one new content to read or listen to in just 15 minutes.
- Reach all your most important goals and improve yourself thanks to the titles selected by the 4books team led by Marco Montemagno.

CHOOSE TO READ OR TO LISTEN

- Listen to the audio version of each content to learn quickly. From now on, you'll need only 15 minutes to improve yourself, week after week.
- Read contents directly on your devices. Do you need to stop reading? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off.
- Organize your content so you always keep track of what you've read and which ones to start.

DO NOT PUT A LIMIT TO HOW MUCH YOU CAN LEARN

- Learning has no limits, with 4books. Learn where and when you want, use 4books from desktop or mobile and access content in audio or text format.
- At the gym, on vacation, while in the car or while traveling. With 4books you learn quickly, wherever you are.
On 4books you only find quality books. We really invest a lot of time in selecting only the best books. On 4books, 11 continuously updated categories are waiting for you.
Learn from the biggest business leaders in the world and improve every day with 4books!

---------------

INFORMATION ON SUBSCRIPTION PLANS:

We currently offer automatic renewal subscription plans that will give you unlimited access to the entire 4books app.
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off within 24 hours of the end of the current period. The renewal amount will be charged to your account, based on the subscription period, within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or disable automatic renewal in your Apple account settings at any time after purchase.
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be lost if you purchase a subscription to that version.
- Any portion of the free trial period will be lost in the event of a change from annual to monthly subscription or vice versa during the free trial period.

Terms and Conditions of Use
http://jo.my/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy
http://jo.my/4booksprivacy

Do you have a feature to suggest for a future version of the app? Do not hesitate to contact us at this email address support@4books.com

descriptionHtml:
Learn the key concepts of the best business books, to read or listen to, anywhere in just 15 minutes.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As of today, over 350,000 people have decided to be part of our big project: to gather the best business ideas and make them available to everyone, easy to understand, quick to put into practice.

LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF THE BEST BUSINESS BOOKS

- Discover the contents of the best books in the world in 11 different categories: marketing and communication, motivation, well-being and personal growth, management and leadership, startups and entrepreneurship, business and strategy, money and investments, economics, science and technology, psychology and sales.
- Update your skills and your training: every week one new content to read or listen to in just 15 minutes.
- Reach all your most important goals and improve yourself thanks to the titles selected by the 4books team led by Marco Montemagno.

CHOOSE TO READ OR TO LISTEN

- Listen to the audio version of each content to learn quickly. From now on, you'll need only 15 minutes to improve yourself, week after week.
- Read contents directly on your devices. Do you need to stop reading? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off.
- Organize your content so you always keep track of what you've read and which ones to start.

DO NOT PUT A LIMIT TO HOW MUCH YOU CAN LEARN

- Learning has no limits, with 4books. Learn where and when you want, use 4books from desktop or mobile and access content in audio or text format.
- At the gym, on vacation, while in the car or while traveling. With 4books you learn quickly, wherever you are.
On 4books you only find quality books. We really invest a lot of time in selecting only the best books. On 4books, 11 continuously updated categories are waiting for you.
Learn from the biggest business leaders in the world and improve every day with 4books!

---------------

INFORMATION ON SUBSCRIPTION PLANS:

We currently offer automatic renewal subscription plans that will give you unlimited access to the entire 4books app.
Payment will be charged to your Google account at the end of the free trial period. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off within 24 hours of the end of the current period. The renewal amount will be charged to your account, based on the subscription period, within 24 hours before the end of the current period. - Any unused portion of the free trial period will be lost if you purchase a subscription to that version.

LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF THE BEST BUSINESS BOOKS

- Organize your content so you always keep track of what you've read and which ones to start.

DO NOT PUT A LIMIT TO HOW MUCH YOU CAN LEARN

- Learning has no limits, with 4books. Learn where and when you want, use 4books from desktop or mobile and access content in audio or text format.

title: 4books: Audiobooks & Podcasts

container.value: Via Giovanni Battista Piranesi 10, CAP 20137, Milano, Italia

creator: Up Srl
descriptionHtml:
More than 1 million people read, listen, and learn the key concepts of the best books, audiobooks and podcasts every day on 4books in more than 15 different categories (business, psychology, investments, leadership, history ...).

Start expanding your knowledge in just 15 minutes with the best books, audiobooks, and podcasts in Italian.

Choose the content you want to read, or listen to in audiobook format.
4books is the mobile app that enables you to listen to exclusive audiobooks, news, and podcasts and learn effortlessly, while doing other activities. On 4books you will also find news, current events, and tools that will help you stay up to date with what’s going on in the world.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.

DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK

- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format.
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.
descriptionShort: Listen, Read & Learn from the best books, podcast, and audio news in just 15 min

Choose the content you want to read, or listen to in audiobook format.
4books is the mobile app that enables you to listen to exclusive audiobooks, news, and podcasts and learn effortlessly, while doing other activities. On 4books you will also find news, current events, and tools that will help you stay up to date with what’s going on in the world.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.

DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK

- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format.
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.

More than 1 million people read, listen, and learn the key concepts of the best books, audiobooks and podcasts every day on 4books in more than 15 different categories (business, psychology, investments, leadership, history ...).

Start expanding your knowledge in just 15 minutes with the best books, audiobooks, and podcasts in Italian.

Choose the content you want to read, or listen to in audiobook format.
4books is the mobile app that enables you to listen to exclusive audiobooks, news, and podcasts and learn effortlessly, while doing other activities. On 4books you will also find news, current events, and tools that will help you stay up to date with what’s going on in the world.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.

DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK

- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format.
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.
descriptionShort: Listen, Read & Learn from the best books, podcast, and audio news in just 15 min

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: While our users were busy learning from the best authors, from all over the world, we got working on the 4books app, and making it even better than before

container.value: Via Giovanni Battista Piranesi 10, CAP 20137, Milano, Italia

creator: Up Srl
descriptionHtml:
More than 1 million people read, listen, and learn the key concepts of the best books, audiobooks and podcasts every day on 4books in more than 15 different categories (business, psychology, investments, leadership, history ...).

Start expanding your knowledge in just 15 minutes with the best books, audiobooks, and podcasts in Italian.

Choose the content you want to read, or listen to in audiobook format.
4books is the mobile app that enables you to listen to exclusive audiobooks, news, and podcasts and learn effortlessly, while doing other activities. On 4books you will also find news, current events, and tools that will help you stay up to date with what’s going on in the world.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.

DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK

- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format.
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.
descriptionShort: Listen, Read & Learn from the best books, podcast, and audio news in just 15 min

- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.

DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK

- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format.
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.
